message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.SE 

This paper is about combining Answer Set Programming (ASP) with domain-specific heuristics to solve industrial problems. ASP is a logic programming paradigm that falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the extension of an ASP solver, which falls under the category of Programming Languages (cs.PL). The use of heuristics to improve performance is related to the field of Optimization (cs.DS), and the focus on solving real-world problems is related to Software Engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper is about solving hard problems, which is related to Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO).
